name: My little sister can't be the murderer!
name_original: My little sister can't be the murderer!
description:
(Note: Press 'H' to hide the UI when you need to.)

Oh no! On a rainy day, your little sister is being accused of murder by a self-claimed detective! You'll have to argue against her to save your sister!

A simple murder case. The culprit is super obvious but I hope you enjoy the banter nonetheless. Don't worry, selecting the wrong choices won't lead to a game over.

Edit 1: Redrawing Mary's sprites.
